name: DUUMBA RUUMBA
description:
DUUMBA RUUMBA

Is a 3D single player, top down, casual, simulation game that puts you in the wheels of a sentient rumba.

Duumba Ruumba will have to do different tasks as fast as possible. From something simple like washing dishes to fighting off an invasion of cockroaches!

At the end YOU will get a well deserved oil massage! Try to beat your own time and score, or your friends, or your family, or even co-workers! Who will be fastest and get the highest score?!

Don’t be a Duumba - GO ruumba!

A fun game for all ages and speed runners.
